ResearchProjectDef.label: Architectural Mimicry
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Hive has begun imitating patterns of construction and structures beyond their natural instincts.

rulesStrings.li: subject->mimicry
subject_story->was the first in a line of temple designers, all sharing the same name
subject_story->developed unique techniques for cutting the hardest rock with basic tools
subject_story->tiled the entirety of the viceroy's palace on a medieval world
subject_gerund->stonecutting
subject_gerund->cutting stones
